Author: isthised
Text: Back when I purged, yes and it gradually became constant. Purging is really dangerous. I got to a point where if I saw a toilet after a meal, my body involuntary vomited. I started vomiting blood. It was terrifying. I hate to think what the dentist would have found if my mum had taken me to one. I had tooth shaped calluses on my pointer finger for YEARS afterwards.   If you’re going to purge, at least talk to your doctor and dentist about harm reduction aka things you can do to minimize some of the secondary harm like the sore throat you’re experiencing.
